 /**
 * Dwell Timer
 * @private
 * @class
 * @memberof EAM.Dwell
 * @param {EAM.Eam} eam
 * @param {EAM.Dwell.Options} options Initial configuration.
 */
function DwellTimer(eam, options){
 
	/**
	* @typedef {Object} Model
	* @memberof EAM.Dwell.DwellTimer
	* @property {EAM.Duration}       saved   Saved activity duration in seconds.
	* @property {(EAM.Time|Boolean)} started Time of the last activity or False when none.
	*/
 
	/** 
	 * @private	
	 * @property {EAM.Dwell.DwellTimer.Model} model
	 */
	var model = {
		saved   : 0,
		started : false
	}
 
	/** 
	 * Get total activity duration.
	 * @method
     * @returns {EAM.Duration} Duration in seconds.
     */	
	this.total = function(){ 
		return saved() + unsaved(); 
	}
 
	/**
     * Save current activity duration.   
     * @method
     * @param {Boolean} restart Indicates new state of activity.
     */
	this.flush = function(restart){
		model.saved  += unsaved();
		model.started = restart && eam.time();
	}
 
	/**
     * Get previous activities duration.
     * @private
     * @returns {EAM.Duration} Duration in seconds.
     */
	function saved(){
		return model.saved;
	}
 
	/**
     * Get current activity duration.
     * @private
     * @returns {EAM.Duration} Duration in seconds.
     */
	function unsaved(){
		if(model.started == false) return 0;
		var now   = eam.time();
		var delta = (now - model.started) / 1000;
		return (delta <= options.latency) ? delta : options.latency + 1;
	}
 
	this.flush(options.start);
}
 
module.exports = DwellTimer;
Generated by istanbul at Thu Apr 23 2015 03:27:31 GMT+0300 (FLE Daylight Time)
